The painful practice with slow insight [: Meditates observing the ugliness of the body
Perceives dissatisfaction with the whole world
Observes the impermanence of all conditions
Has well established the perception of their own death
Relies on these five powers of a trainee: faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom
These five faculties manifest in them weakly: faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom
Slowly attain the conditions for ending the defilements in the present life

Swiftly attain the conditions for ending the defilements in the present life
